com.hazelcast.client.impl

Interface ClientEndpoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Client, Endpoint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientEndpointImpl

    public interface ClientEndpoint
extends Client
    Represents an endpoint to a client. So for each client connected to a member, a ClientEndpoint object is available.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDestroyAction(String registrationId, Callable<Boolean> removeAction)
      Adds a remove callable to be called when endpoint is destroyed Note: removeDestroyAction should be called when there is no need to destroy action anymore.
      void addListenerDestroyAction(String service, String topic, String id)
      Adds a remove callable to be called when endpoint is destroyed to clean related listener Following line will be called when endpoint destroyed : eventService.deregisterListener(service, topic, ID); Note: removeDestroyAction should be called when there is no need to destroy action anymore.
      void authenticated(ClientPrincipal principal) 
      void authenticated(ClientPrincipal principal, Credentials credentials, boolean firstConnection, String clientVersion, long authCorrelationId)

    • Method Detail

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Checks if the endpoint is alive.
        Returns:
        true if alive, false otherwise.

      • addListenerDestroyAction

        void addListenerDestroyAction(String service,
                              String topic,
                              String id)
        Adds a remove callable to be called when endpoint is destroyed to clean related listener Following line will be called when endpoint destroyed : eventService.deregisterListener(service, topic, ID); Note: removeDestroyAction should be called when there is no need to destroy action anymore.
        Parameters:
        service - name of the related service of listener
        topic - topic name of listener(mostly distributed object name)
        id - registration ID of remove action

      • addDestroyAction

        void addDestroyAction(String registrationId,
                      Callable<Boolean> removeAction)
        Adds a remove callable to be called when endpoint is destroyed Note: removeDestroyAction should be called when there is no need to destroy action anymore.
        Parameters:
        registrationId - registration ID of destroy action
        removeAction - callable that will be called when endpoint is destroyed

      • removeDestroyAction

        boolean removeDestroyAction(String id)
        Parameters:
        id - registration ID of destroy action
        Returns:
        true if remove is successful

        Credentials getCredentials()

      • setTransactionContext

        void removeTransactionContext(String txnId)

      • isOwnerConnection

        boolean isOwnerConnection()
        Indicates whether this endpoint is the owner connection for that client.
        Returns:
        true when this endpoint is the owner connection for the client

      • authenticated

        void authenticated(ClientPrincipal principal)

      • isAuthenticated

        boolean isAuthenticated()
        Returns:
        true if endpoint is authenticated with valid security credentials, returns false otherwise

      • getClientVersion

        int getClientVersion()
        Returns:
        the client version as calculated by BuildInfo

      • setClientVersion

        void setClientVersion(String version)
        Parameters:
        version - the version string as obtained from the environment

      • setClientStatistics

        void setClientStatistics(String stats)
        Updates to the latest client statistics.
        Parameters:
        stats - the latest statistics retrieved from the client

      • getClientStatistics

        String getClientStatistics()
        Returns:
        statistics string for the client
